description:
Rinne`s grandma cleans her house, and digs up some goodies. Rinne`s Dad is broke again. A demon tries to take one of Sakura`s friends` brothers to Hell.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Digging Up Memories / Can I Borrow Money? / Demon at the Campground
Omoide Hakkutsu / Okane Kashite? / Camp Ba no Akuma
思い出発掘 / お金貸して? / キャンプ場の悪魔
